about_the_game:
The year 848. The world is mired in lies and desire. Arrogant rich men control the destinies of ordinary townspeople. Only by clinging to the favour of the nobility can one find a miserable shelter.

The protagonist Envet Nokt, having lost everything, takes the path of thievery to survive in this rotten world.

You will have to learn to hide in the darkness and beware of the light. Uncover the dark secrets of other people's homes and their inhabitants to find your place in the sun.

Key Features:
- Isometric Stealth-RPG.
- Unique hacking mechanics.
- Think through your every move to get to your target.
- Hide in the shadows, because darkness is your best friend. But remember, it may not be as safe as you think.
- A detailed world and a plot with unexpected twists and turns.
- No killing, only the skill of stealth will help you to pass the way of Envet Nokt.
